article_title: China Says To Speed Up Approvals For Some Drugs
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: china, says, speed, approvals, some, drugs

og.description: The China Food and Drug Administration (CFDA) said Friday that it would prioritize the approval of drugs with "clear clinical value."
